resources.string: Inshorts.me is an unofficial API for Inshorts for fetching latest news.
Blazing fast. No more scraping the pages for news, 18 different categories.
Cookies and Usage Data can be used by Google Analytics (Google Inc.):

Google Analytics is a web analysis service provided by Google Inc. (“Google”). Google utilizes the Data collected to track and examine the use of this Application, to prepare reports on its activities and share them with other Google services. Google may use the Data collected to contextualize and personalize the ads of its own advertising network. Place of processing: US (read following:)
More details concerning the collection or processing of Cookies and Usage Data, or any issues may be requested from the Data Controller at any time with following link:

In accordance with the terms of use of the materials of the Inshorts.me site, the creator of the app does not take responsibility for the validity of the information published on the site as it is copied based on the site rules (author and source of article are written). Regarding the article published on the site, the opinion of its author and the site editors may not be the same.
Also, the creator of the app does not undertake to write a separate answer to each of the letters sent by his readers.
